attributes.title: try again trumpie✨
attributes.review: this app actually made my phone go back to factory mode so it’s a complete virus. i DEMAND that this gets taken off of the app store because i had to reset EVERYTHING! my apple ID, my apps, my contacts, and everything else on my phone was lost. the only thing i didn’t lose, was my hatred of this app. it is honestly terrible. i would give it zero if i could.

attributes.title: pumpkin man
attributes.review: Right when I opened the app I saw this pumpkin shaped long thing. Then I realized it was TRUMP... so I nearly fell of my unicorn and I went back to my house and I had to hop on my dog and my dog was scared so he ran into a hole then I had my cat take me to the dog park so he can play with the doggies then after I went home and I played with my pet snake he amazing and I told him to go find trump and eat him so trump beware my snake will have ya for a snack

attributes.title: Bad UI
attributes.review: I got this app a month ago and I would use it periodically to look and see if there were any rallies in my area. What bothered me the most was it’s constant crashing on my phone, and whenever I tried to scroll, it would glitch. The app definitely needs to be optimized. I may redownload in the future if the app is optimized, but for now I am leaving a 1 star review.

attributes.title: my dreams are crushed ( worst app ever)
attributes.review: I was told that by someone that this man was the best president we every had and that he would stop world hunger and by downloading his app world peace would be solved and that the president administration would defend the police and a special team force would go on a special mission and arrest the cops that killed Breanna Taylor!!! It has now been approximately 24hrs and none of that has happened!! THIS APP IS THE WORST ITS A SCAM NO ONE DOWNLOAD IT!!!

attributes.title: DONT GET ITTTTTTTTTT
attributes.review: Omg as soon as I downloaded this app someone came to my house and smashed my face in. Then they tried to steal my dogs but I stopped them. But they tried to make me sub to their only fans who do they think I am. But when I did it was just naked pics of DONALD TRUMPPPPP. That is nasty. So I decided to delete the app but when I did I became BLIND. So I wrote this review from my grandmothers grave bc they threw expensive avocados at her. Just don’t get it.

attributes.title: Broke my phone???
attributes.review: Ever since I’ve downloaded the app my screen will sometimes just go blank? Like if there’s music or a video playing the sounds will still works but the screen goes completely black? Also a red light next to my camera at the top of my phone has been blinking and randomly turning on and I’ve never seen that before? 🤔

attributes.title: poopy app
attributes.review: i think this app is very bad. every time i fall asleep i see images of an orange face (trump) dancing with charli d’amelio!! how dare he dance with the social media star!!  and then in the morning i see posters saying “trump 2020!” and then i try to rip it off but i can’t! it’s like it’s super glued to the wall or something!! that little chetto is my nemesis! and then when i finally rip it off there’s more little posters of trump doing and saying racist things!! and then i grab my phone and delete the app! then every thing went away. the posters, the images in my mind! i recommend that you don’t get this app because i don’t want the same thing happening to you!!

attributes.title: no ❤️
attributes.review:
i went to download this app because i absolutely ✨love and cherish my non homophobic, racist, and misogynistic president✨, but it took a three months to download 😡😡😡😡 i was willing to wait because i’m just that devoted to this now god awful app, but once i opened it, it wiped my phone and stole all my money 😡😡😡😡😔😔😔😔😤😤😤😤😤. DO NOT download this app under any circumstances....unless you wanna give it a bad review 😌😌😌. have a nice day! 

love,
gen z 😗❤️

attributes.title: I hope trump runs out of spray tan🧚🥰
attributes.review: Oh my god! This is the worst app ever! When I opened it my phone got all glitchy and now my camera roll is only pictures of this orange tini tiny penis!!! This needs to be taken down now! I am going to have to go to Therapy because of this. PLEASE DONT GET THIS APP. THE PENISES WILL COME FOR YOU TOO!!!! Save your eyes! This needs to be taken care of. Apple should be ashamed that they still have this in the App Store. 🧚🥰😌🧚💖

attributes.title: ✨No✨
attributes.review: Trump is a lair. He is racist, sexist, and some of the things he has said on his twitter page are disgusting. I strongly hope he gets voted out this year before he starts WW3. We need a real leader to run this country, not someone from a reality tv show guy. If he takes away tiktok just because of the simple fact it’s from China, two can play at that game, let’s take away this app from him too.
